description: Jackson ... When I first met this sexy ass Marine he was down on the beach spending his day surfing. Jackson and I quickly made friends and it wasn't long before we were back at the beach house filming this scene. We quickly find out that his shirt isn't just a joke, 'Half Man, Half Horse' is a pretty accurate description of Jackson who is sporting close to ten thick inches. Jackson is a bad boy. He had gotten into some legal trouble in the Marines for beating up an officer and would shortly be carted off to the brig for his actions. Thankfully, I found him before they carted him off. Jackson is my absolute dream man. I cannot go on and on about him enough. I got a call from him the other day and he's out of the brig now and ready to come back to the Active Duty fold. I can't wait. For now, let's enjoy this blue-eyed, horse-hung handsome devil in his first solo scene ever. Stay tuned. I am sure there is much more to come of this tough guy in the future.
title: Jackson Debuts
